abstract: Q. and A. with David Downs, the commissioner of the North American Soccer League.
snippet: Q. and A. with David Downs, the commissioner of the North American Soccer League.
lead_paragraph: MIAMI -- The entrance to the office of the North American Soccer League's commissioner is adorned with the jerseys of the league's eight teams, which are arranged on hangers that can be moved as the standings change. The league's six-team playoffs started Saturday.

headline.main: Q. and A.: N.A.S.L. Commissioner David Downs
